x_nuvo_diag_probes.description: Application Registry Table wasn't extended from App File table
x_nuvo_diag_probes.name: App Reg records not scoped.
x_nuvo_diag_probes.remediation: Application Reg records not referencing the Scope/Application. > Reloaded the OOTB Records and changed Client Secret.

sys_update_version.name: x_nuvo_diag_probes_491c98551b8f651088b2777e0a4bcb87
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_nuvo_diag_probes"><x_nuvo_diag_probes action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Application Registry Table wasn't extended from App File table</description><healthcheck_type/><name>App Reg records not scoped.</name><order/><probe_type/><product_version>21.1.2</product_version><remediation>Application Reg records not referencing the Scope/Application. > Reloaded the OOTB Records and changed Client Secret. </remediation><script><![CDATA[var util = new x_nuvo_diag.DiagnosticUtil();

var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_db_object');
gr.addQuery('name', 'oauth_entity');

gr.query();
if (gr.next()){
	if(gr.super_class == '') {
		util.handelOutput('oauth_entity is not extended from the sys_metadata. Submit an isue to Service not to fix this. The reload the Nuvolo file to the Applicaiotn Registry.','Error','Mobile');
	} 
}]]></script><sys_class_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>michael.peck@nuvolo.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-05-25 14:29:35</sys_created_on><sys_id>491c98551b8f651088b2777e0a4bcb87</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>App Reg records not scoped.</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Diagnostic Tool" source="x_nuvo_diag">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Diagnostic Tool">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes_491c98551b8f651088b2777e0a4bcb87</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>iliyan.nedelchev@nuvolo.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-12-04 09:40:00</sys_updated_on><tool>diagnostic</tool></x_nuvo_diag_probes></record_update>
